scripts.start: watchify src/main.js src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone fitbit_day -o demo/fitbit_day.js -v
scripts.build: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone fitbit_day > dist/fitbit_day.js
scripts.buildMin: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone fitbit_day | uglifyjs -cm > dist/fitbit_day.min.js
